text: Housesitter is a 1992 American romantic comedy movie directed by Frank Oz and starring Steve Martin, Goldie Hawn, Dana Delany, Julie Harris, Donald Moffat, Peter MacNicol, Ken Cheeseman. It was distributed by Universal Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1992 romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Frank Oz Category:Universal Pictures movies Category:Movies set in Boston Category:Movies set in Massachusetts
title: Housesitter
